name: minighost

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Proxy Application. A Finite Difference proxy application which
implements a difference stencil across a homogenous three dimensional
domain.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich2 is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)
